vegetation.name: Acrocarpus fraxinifolius
vegetation.description: Acrocarpus fraxinifolius is foliage deciduous trees. Also classified as exotic big tree that can grow up to 60 m height.

vegetation.name: Markhamia lutea
vegetation.description: Grevillearobusta is an evergreen foliage. It is an exotic tree with an average of 10 m height with 100 cm diameter. The trees it self can grow quite fast.

vegetation.name: Podocarpus falcatu
vegetation.description: Podocarpus falcatus is a foliage deciduous native. Classified as big trees that usually grow up to 30 - 46 m height. It is very good be a used as reforestation species.

vegetation.name: Prunus africana
vegetation.description: Prunus africana is a rosaceae family which can grow up to 25 m. It is an evergreen and native tree which can be used for reforestation also extract to be a medicine.
